content: materials 2 skeins of purl soho s line weight 1 100% merino each skein is 494 yards/ 100 grams - color a we used the color storm gray - color b we used the color oyster gray you ll also need - a us 2 3 mm 12-inch circular needle 2 - a set of us 2 double pointed needles 3 - a pom pom maker for the roll brim hat note this is enough yarn for ten hats gauge 8 stitches = 1 inch in stockinette stitch size finished circumference 13½ inches 1 https //www purlsoho com/line-weight html 2 https //www purlsoho com/tools/knitting-needles html type_filter=881 3 https //www purlsoho com/tools/knitting-needles html type_filter=888
